Question: This person was fascinated by the machine and how it would always execute software code perfectly.
Hints: Many decisions that led to antitrust litigation over Microsoft's business practices have had this person's approval.
This person oversaw the business details, but continued to write code as well.
He was the fourth of his name in his family, but was known as William **** III or "Trey" because his father had the "II" suffix.
